name: AsyncObjects
summary: Synchronization objects for modern swift concurrency.
description: Several synchronization primitives and task synchronization mechanisms introduced to aid in modern swift concurrency.

scripts.build: cross-env ASYNCOBJECTS_ENABLE_DEV=1 SWIFTCI_CONCURRENCY_CHECKS=1 npm exec --package=swiftylab-ci -- build.js
scripts.test: cross-env ASYNCOBJECTS_ENABLE_DEV=1 ASYNCOBJECTS_USE_CHECKEDCONTINUATION=1 ASYNCOBJECTS_ENABLE_LOGGING_LEVEL=info npm exec --package=swiftylab-ci -- test.js --parallel
scripts.preview-doc: cross-env ASYNCOBJECTS_ENABLE_DEV=1 npm exec --package=swiftylab-ci -- preview-doc.js AsyncObjects
scripts.build-doc: cross-env ASYNCOBJECTS_ENABLE_DEV=1 npm exec --package=swiftylab-ci -- build-doc.js AsyncObjects
scripts.serve-doc: cross-env ASYNCOBJECTS_ENABLE_DEV=1 npm exec --package=swiftylab-ci -- serve-doc.js AsyncObjects
